Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 8th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1983...
Traded from Cleveland to Los Angeles on 5/19/1985 (Going to LA: 2B R. Gant. Going to CLE: 1B H. Ochiai)...
Had first career hit (double) on 5/5/1988, off Tommy Boggs (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/8/1988, off Rich Gossage (NYM)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against New York (N) on 5/13/1989...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 6/16/1989...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/21/1992, hitting .419 with 4 HR, 8 RBI...
Traded from Los Angeles to New York (N) on 1/31/1993 (Going to LA: CF B. Giles, RF S. Green, C G. Williams. Going to NYM: LF G. Sheffield, 2B R. Gant, RF T. Benzinger, P J. Jones)...
Traded from Baltimore to Boston on 7/21/1996 (Going to BOS: 2B R. Gant. Going to BAL: C B. Santiago)...
